title: Email Notification Payload
description: JSON schema for the email notification payload sent to the Logic App

title.description: Title of the email/report, used in the email subject

timeFrame.description: The time period covered by the report, appended to the subject

body.description: Well-formatted HTML content for the email body

workflowRunUrl.description: URL to the workflow run that generated this report

recipients.description: List of email addresses to send the notification to
